name: AutonomAI
description:
Robot Big Baba was knocked down by a meteroid. But there are robots nearby that can help him. But these robots are autonomous and as soon as you give them tasks, they become dissatisfied, because they have better things to do.

Actually, they should not even notice this giant robot, but they have already been warned that enemies are coming soon. 

Unite autonomous robots to repair Big Baba so he defeats the enemies!

This is a game created for the Dung GameJam with the theme of autonomy.

Controls:
Move the mouse to move, drag Mouse to rotate.
